net.rim.device.api.ui.accessibility
Interface AccessibleDateField

public interface AccessibleDateField

Represents a part of date field, such as Hour. Date input fields usually contain the following children fields: Month, Day, Year. Each of them should have AccessibleRole.DATE_FIELD role and implement this interface. Assistive technology will read which part of the date field is currently focused and read its changes.

Since:
BlackBerry API 4.6.1

Method Summary
 int getDateFieldType()
          Returns date subfield type, such as Hour, Minute, etc.
 



Method Detail

getDateFieldType

int getDateFieldType()
Returns date subfield type, such as Hour, Minute, etc. Check DateFormat for available date field codes.

Since:
BlackBerry API 4.6.1
